content.raw: Hmm, I did actually try these degenerate joints but issue does not like so much with that is it does with a null pointer assertion on the child. Just try to fix a model to the frame with the child as world and it should crash. I apologize for the confusion but by "Fixed" I mean fixed to the world frame, not fixed in place.
content.html: Hmm, I did actually try these degenerate joints but issue does not like so much with that is it does with a null pointer assertion on the child. Just try to fix a model to the frame with the child as world and it should crash. I apologize for the confusion but by "Fixed" I mean fixed to the world frame, not fixed in place.
